stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (try_trait #42327)

apiDescription: The error type that results from applying the try operator (?) to a None value. If you wish to allow x? (where x is an Option<T>) to be converted into your error type, you can implement impl From<NoneError> for YourErrorType. In that case, x? within a function that returns Result<_, YourErrorType> will translate a None value into an Err result.
